title: 1+2)×3 gives wrong result
body:
**Describe the bug**
1+2)×3 gives wrong result. This error really caught me off guard.

**Smartphone:**
 - Device: Samsung Galaxy A52 5g
 - OS: Android 14
 - App version 3.0.1
comments: Typing this in exactly via pc keyboard does result in an error that should not be possible using device screen input. Will investigate. Please provide more detail.
I used the on-screen keyboard, but I typed 1+2*3 first and then added the parenthesis.
Got it. This is a previously uncaught parenthesis entry issue.  Will investigate and correct ASAP.
